author: Emily Fuchs (she/they)
title: Midterm 1 Update
question: Please note that we have adjusted the duration of Midterm 1 from 2 hours to 1.5 hours. 1.5 hours will be sufficient time to complete the exam. The duration and end time have been updated on the exam instructions page and as previously specified on the exam instructions page, students are not permitted to leave the Zoom session before the scheduled end time of the exam.
